dict.acceptation: 借入；借钱，借用；[数]由上位借；抄袭；
借，借用；担保物，抵押；[英史]什一税；

sent.orig: You can borrow books from the library, but you can't borrow one without a library card.
sent.trans: 你可以在图书馆借书，但是没有借书证就借不到。

sent.orig: Can I borrow your pen, please? Do you a spare pen I can borrow?
sent.trans: 你可以借我一直笔吗？你有多余一支笔可以借给我吗？

sent.orig: While Decoration includes discover, reverse borrow and direct borrow from the material.
sent.trans: 在装饰手法方面，体现在对传统装饰手法的新发现、反借用、对材质本身的直接借用三个方面。

sent.orig: Why do not you borrow to me?
If you borrow another person's phrasing, that material must be enclosed in quotation marks.
sent.trans: 如果你借用他人的言论，这段材料必须加上引号。
